author: crossley
msg: Configuration to disable copyright footer on each page of PDF.
A footer is composed for each page. By default, a "credit" with role=pdf
will be used. Otherwise a copyright statement will be generated.
This latter can be disabled with "disable-copyright-footer".

author: hemapani
msg: check in the Dasarath's OM on behalf of Dasarath

author: cziegeler
msg: Cache the mime-type of readers and serializers.

author: ekoneil
msg: Fix a problem where the "sharedFlow" object was not available to the dataSource EL for read or write.
Update a binding test to include this case.
